projects.title: Speedo
projects.description: High-energy commercial soundtrack featuring dynamic percussion and motivational themes.
projects.brief: Create an energetic and motivational soundtrack that captures the spirit of competitive swimming.
projects.approach: We used a combination of live percussion, synthesized elements, and underwater sound design to create an immersive aquatic atmosphere.
projects.technical_notes: Recorded in 48kHz/24-bit, mixed in Dolby Atmos for spatial audio experience.

projects.title: Ladies In Black
projects.description: Period drama score blending orchestral arrangements with contemporary elements.
awards: AACTA Award Nomination - Best Original Music Score
projects.brief: Compose a score that bridges 1950s Australia with modern sensibilities.
projects.approach: Traditional orchestral writing combined with subtle electronic textures to create emotional depth while maintaining period authenticity.
projects.technical_notes: Full orchestra recording at Abbey Road Studios, 88-piece ensemble.

projects.title: The Speedway Murders
projects.description: Dark and investigative score for true crime documentary series.
projects.brief: Create tension and atmosphere for a gripping true crime investigation.
projects.approach: Minimalist approach using processed piano, strings, and ambient textures to build psychological tension.
projects.technical_notes: Extensive use of granular synthesis and prepared piano techniques.

projects.title: The Art Of Sound
projects.description: Meta-documentary exploring the role of sound in film, featuring experimental compositions.
awards: Best Documentary Score - Melbourne Film Festival
projects.brief: Compose music that demonstrates the principles being discussed in the documentary.
projects.approach: Self-referential scoring techniques where the music becomes part of the narrative structure.
projects.technical_notes: Multi-layered composition showcasing various film scoring techniques discussed in the documentary.

projects.title: The Convert
projects.description: Dramatic feature film score exploring themes of faith and transformation.
projects.brief: Compose a deeply emotional score that captures the protagonist's spiritual journey.
projects.approach: Gradual musical transformation mirroring the character's evolution, incorporating sacred music traditions.
projects.technical_notes: Features 40-piece string section and 16-voice choir, recorded at Angel Studios.

projects.title: Gold
projects.description: Tension-filled thriller score with modern orchestral and electronic elements.
projects.brief: Create suspenseful music that builds tension throughout the narrative arc.
projects.approach: Hybrid orchestral-electronic score using unconventional instruments and recording techniques.
projects.technical_notes: Innovative use of extended techniques including prepared strings and processed brass.

projects.title: The Hunter
projects.description: Atmospheric score for psychological thriller set in remote wilderness.
projects.brief: Capture the isolation and psychological tension of the wilderness setting.
projects.approach: Extensive use of field recordings and environmental sounds integrated with traditional orchestration.
projects.technical_notes: On-location recording sessions in remote forests to capture authentic environmental textures.

projects.title: The Artful Dodger
projects.description: Playful and adventurous score for period television series adaptation.
projects.brief: Create a musical world that captures the spirit of Dickensian London with contemporary energy.
projects.approach: Traditional orchestral writing with modern rhythmic elements and world music influences.
projects.technical_notes: Chamber orchestra recording with period instrument specialists.
